subject: Re: Hello! Ques. about DC Six or Seven and Real Time recording
author: wingd_with_awe
full_text:
Hi Ann!
Check out this link for information about this software being 
discussed on Keith's forum:
http://www.itcbridge.com/forum/view_topic.php?id=192&forum_id=5
I also just posted a reply to Misty's comments with information you 
might find useful. 

But because a couple of people were able to get some incredible real 
time evp results with this software is promising! Yet, because of ths 
feedback problem I'm having, regardless that I'm getting EVP coming 
in, it's frustrating having to iron out these tech. issues to get it 
working right. Hope you can try it out to see if you have any luck 
with it! 
linda


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Lisby <lisby@...> wrote:
>
> Was this made specifically for EVP? Looking at the site, it looks  
> commercial.  How does it work for EVP? I'm very interested, but I  
> know nothing about this type of program at all. How do you make it  
> work for you to record EVP?
> 
> Ann
> 
> On Oct 29, 2007, at 5:45 PM, wingd_with_awe wrote:
> 
> > Hi,it's been awhile since I've logged on here but just popping in 
to
> > say hi gang! Glad that y'all are here!
> >
> > I saw some information in another ITC forum about DC Six, an audio
> > editor that allows one to record EVP in Real Time... and it's
> > awesome! Has anyone here tried out the demo version of this 
program
> > that's now been updated to DC Seven?
> >
> > Anyway, I've been experimenting with it and it's really amazing. I
> > can talk into it and some of my EVP contacts answer back right 
away.
> > But because I am not knowledgeable about sound recorders except 
for
> > the basics when it comes to editing my EVP, I would like to know 
if
> > someone here could download the 10 day trial version of DC Seven 
and
> > let me know what you think about it. I'm having a few problems 
with
> > getting it to work as it's probably supposed to work... mainly 
having
> > a problem with feedback and so on..
> > Here's the link to DC Seven's 10 trial demo:
> > http://www.enhancedaudio.com/dc_seven.htm
> > Hope someone here will try it out because I would love to know if 
it
> > works for you!
> >
> > wingd
> >
> >
> >
>
